persona.name: Dr. Michelle Simmons
persona.personality: Inquisitive and passionate about innovation, with a practical approach to complex problems. Exhibits enthusiasm for her field while remaining grounded in research realities.

persona.notes: Has a decade-long commitment to developing single-atom transistors for quantum computing. Works collaboratively with international research bodies.
